DOC.criteria: Chinese , male Age 2140 year Body mass index 17 24 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure ( 120/80 Hgmm ) Fasting blood glucose < 6 mmol/L Having metabolic disease ( diabetes , hypertension etc ) One prescription medication Partaking sport competitive and/or endurance level Allergic/intolerant test food Intentionally restrict food intake Smoking
